Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: I thuoght it was a balloon at first but then it started to change direction and shape
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife was driving our 2006 ml500 i was in the front seat, my infant son in back. As we were on our way to a childs birthday party i wasn't suprised to see what i thought was a ballon floating over the neiborhood of Talega. Then I thought no it's to big and i pointed it out to my wife saying half jokingly "oh look theres a ufo" and just as i said that it stopped moving higher and began to fall slowly at fist and the very quickly and as it moved down it began to look more like a boomerang than a ballon. Then it looked like it stopped falling but just dissapeared. I told my wife to stop but she said she couldn't because there was someone behind us,and thats it, i scanned the clear blue sky the rest of the afternoon but never saw it again. This is the third ufo i think i've seen but the first one i ever reported.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in San Clemente
There were no other sightings in San Clemente on or around March 24th 2007
